mapper.select:
select l.id_labor as "l_id_labor", l.grupo as "l_grupo", l.nombre as "l_nombre", l.fecha_comienzo as "l_fecha_comienzo", l.cantidad_dosis_por_ha as "l_cantidad_dosis_por_ha", l.duracion as "l_duracion", l.litros_gasoil as "l_litros_gasoil",
lpa.id_labor as "lpa_id_labor", lpa.id_parcela as "lpa_id_parcela", lpa.posicion_formula as "lpa_posicion_formula",
pa.id_parcela as "lpa_pa_id_parcela", pa.nombre as "lpa_pa_nombre" , pa.nombre_corto as "lpa_pa_nombre_corto" , pa.extension as "lpa_pa_valor_extension" , pa.cultivo_fijo as "lpa_pa_cultivo_fijo" , pa.color as "lpa_pa_color" ,
lcm.id_labor as "lcm_id_labor", lcm.id_coste_maquinaria as "lcm_id_coste_maquinaria", lcm.multiplicador as "lcm_multiplicador", lcm.constante as "lcm_constante", lcm.posicion_formula as "lcm_posicion_formula",
cm.id_coste_maquinaria as "lcm_cm_id_coste_maquinaria", cm.nombre as "lcm_cm_nombre" , cm.tipo as "lcm_cm_tipo" , cm.valor_compra as "lcm_cm_valor_compra" , cm.valor_desecho as "lcm_cm_valor_desecho" , cm.horas_trabajo as "lcm_cm_horas_trabajo" , cm.interes as "lcm_cm_interes" , cm.anyos_mas_1 as "lcm_cm_anyos_mas_1" , cm.reparacion_variable as "lcm_cm_reparacion_variable" , cm.alojamiento_variable as "lcm_cm_alojamiento_variable" , cm.prima_seguro as "lcm_cm_prima_seguro" , cm.cv as "lcm_cm_cv" , cm.litros_cv_y_hora as "lcm_cm_litros_cv_y_hora" , cm.horas_cambio_aceite as "lcm_cm_horas_cambio_aceite" , cm.litros_aceite as "lcm_cm_litros_aceite" ,
lp.id_labor as "lp_id_labor", lp.id_producto as "lp_id_producto", lp.multiplicador as "lp_multiplicador", lp.constante as "lp_constante", lp.posicion_formula as "lp_posicion_formula",
tp.id_producto as "lp_tp_id_producto", tp.grupo as "lp_tp_grupo", tp.tipo as "lp_tp_tipo", tp.nombre as "lp_tp_nombre", tp.descripcion as "lp_tp_descripcion", tp.num_reg_ma as "lp_tp_num_reg_ma", tp.plazo_seguridad as "lp_tp_plazo_seguridad",
lpe.id_labor as "lpe_id_labor", lpe.id_personal as "lpe_id_personal", lpe.id_coste_personal as "lpe_id_coste_personal", lpe.multiplicador as "lpe_multiplicador", lpe.constante as "lpe_constante", lpe.posicion_formula as "lpe_posicion_formula",
cpe.id_coste_personal as "lpe_cpe_id_coste_personal", cpe.tipo as "lpe_cpe_tipo", cpe.funcion as "lpe_cpe_funcion", cpe.salario_base as "lpe_cpe_salario_base", cpe.paga_extra as "lpe_cpe_paga_extra", cpe.horas_anuales as "lpe_cpe_horas_anuales", cpe.base_ssp as "lpe_cpe_base_ssp", cpe.desempleo_pc as "lpe_cpe_desempleo_pc", cpe.plus_distancia as "lpe_cpe_plus_distancia", cpe.km as "lpe_cpe_km", cpe.horas_dia as "lpe_cpe_horas_dia", cpe.validez_inicio as "lpe_cpe_validez_inicio", cpe.validez_fin as "lpe_cpe_validez_fin",
pe.id_personal as "lpe_pe_id_personal", pe.nombre as "lpe_pe_nombre", pe.apellidos as "lpe_pe_apellidos"
from gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores l left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores_parcelas lpa on l.id_labor = lpa.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_parcelas pa on lpa.id_parcela = pa.id_parcela
left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_l_costes_maquinaria lcm on l.id_labor = lcm.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_costes_maquinaria cm on lcm.id_coste_maquinaria = cm.id_coste_maquinaria left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_l_productos lp on l.id_labor = lp.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_productos tp on lp.id_producto = tp.id_producto
left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_l_costes_personal lpe on l.id_labor = lpe.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_costes_personal cpe on lpe.id_coste_personal = cpe.id_coste_personal left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_personal pe on lpe.id_personal = pe.id_personal where l.id_labor = #{id_labor}

select l.id_labor as "l_id_labor", l.grupo as "l_grupo", l.nombre as "l_nombre", l.fecha_comienzo as "l_fecha_comienzo", l.cantidad_dosis_por_ha as "l_cantidad_dosis_por_ha", l.duracion as "l_duracion", l.litros_gasoil as "l_litros_gasoil",
lpa.id_labor as "lpa_id_labor", lpa.id_parcela as "lpa_id_parcela", lpa.posicion_formula as "lpa_posicion_formula",
pa.id_parcela as "lpa_pa_id_parcela", pa.nombre as "lpa_pa_nombre" , pa.nombre_corto as "lpa_pa_nombre_corto" , pa.extension as "lpa_pa_valor_extension" , pa.cultivo_fijo as "lpa_pa_cultivo_fijo" , pa.color as "lpa_pa_color" ,
lcm.id_labor as "lcm_id_labor", lcm.id_coste_maquinaria as "lcm_id_coste_maquinaria", lcm.multiplicador as "lcm_multiplicador", lcm.constante as "lcm_constante", lcm.posicion_formula as "lcm_posicion_formula",
cm.id_coste_maquinaria as "lcm_cm_id_coste_maquinaria", cm.nombre as "lcm_cm_nombre" , cm.tipo as "lcm_cm_tipo" , cm.valor_compra as "lcm_cm_valor_compra" , cm.valor_desecho as "lcm_cm_valor_desecho" , cm.horas_trabajo as "lcm_cm_horas_trabajo" , cm.interes as "lcm_cm_interes" , cm.anyos_mas_1 as "lcm_cm_anyos_mas_1" , cm.reparacion_variable as "lcm_cm_reparacion_variable" , cm.alojamiento_variable as "lcm_cm_alojamiento_variable" , cm.prima_seguro as "lcm_cm_prima_seguro" , cm.cv as "lcm_cm_cv" , cm.litros_cv_y_hora as "lcm_cm_litros_cv_y_hora" , cm.horas_cambio_aceite as "lcm_cm_horas_cambio_aceite" , cm.litros_aceite as "lcm_cm_litros_aceite" ,
lp.id_labor as "lp_id_labor", lp.id_producto as "lp_id_producto", lp.multiplicador as "lp_multiplicador", lp.constante as "lp_constante", lp.posicion_formula as "lp_posicion_formula",
tp.id_producto as "lp_tp_id_producto", tp.grupo as "lp_tp_grupo", tp.tipo as "lp_tp_tipo", tp.nombre as "lp_tp_nombre", tp.descripcion as "lp_tp_descripcion", tp.num_reg_ma as "lp_tp_num_reg_ma", tp.plazo_seguridad as "lp_tp_plazo_seguridad",
lpe.id_labor as "lpe_id_labor", lpe.id_personal as "lpe_id_personal", lpe.id_coste_personal as "lpe_id_coste_personal", lpe.multiplicador as "lpe_multiplicador", lpe.constante as "lpe_constante", lpe.posicion_formula as "lpe_posicion_formula",
cpe.id_coste_personal as "lpe_cpe_id_coste_personal", cpe.tipo as "lpe_cpe_tipo", cpe.funcion as "lpe_cpe_funcion", cpe.salario_base as "lpe_cpe_salario_base", cpe.paga_extra as "lpe_cpe_paga_extra", cpe.horas_anuales as "lpe_cpe_horas_anuales", cpe.base_ssp as "lpe_cpe_base_ssp", cpe.desempleo_pc as "lpe_cpe_desempleo_pc", cpe.plus_distancia as "lpe_cpe_plus_distancia", cpe.km as "lpe_cpe_km", cpe.horas_dia as "lpe_cpe_horas_dia", cpe.validez_inicio as "lpe_cpe_validez_inicio", cpe.validez_fin as "lpe_cpe_validez_fin",
pe.id_personal as "lpe_pe_id_personal", pe.nombre as "lpe_pe_nombre", pe.apellidos as "lpe_pe_apellidos"
from gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores l left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores_parcelas lpa on l.id_labor = lpa.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_parcelas pa on lpa.id_parcela = pa.id_parcela
left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_l_costes_maquinaria lcm on l.id_labor = lcm.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_costes_maquinaria cm on lcm.id_coste_maquinaria = cm.id_coste_maquinaria left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_l_productos lp on l.id_labor = lp.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_productos tp on lp.id_producto = tp.id_producto
left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_l_costes_personal lpe on l.id_labor = lpe.id_labor left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_costes_personal cpe on lpe.id_coste_personal = cpe.id_coste_personal left join gonzalol_chinchilla.t_personal pe on lpe.id_personal = pe.id_personal

select tl.id_labor as "id_labor", grupo as "grupo", nombre as "nombre", fecha_comienzo as "fecha_comienzo", cantidad_dosis_por_ha as "cantidad_dosis_por_ha", duracion as "duracion", litros_gasoil as "litros_gasoil" FROM gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores tl LEFT JOIN gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores_parcelas lp ON tl.id_labor = lp.id_labor WHERE id_parcela = #{id_parcela}

select id_labor as "id_labor", grupo as "grupo", nombre as "nombre", fecha_comienzo as "fecha_comienzo", cantidad_dosis_por_ha as "cantidad_dosis_por_ha", duracion as "duracion", extension as "litros_gasoil" from gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores where nombre = #{nombre}
mapper.insert: insert into gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores (grupo, nombre, fecha_comienzo, cantidad_dosis_por_ha, duracion, extension) values (#{grupo}, #{nombre}, #{fecha_comienzo}, #{cantidad_dosis_por_ha}, #{extension}, #{extension})
mapper.update: update gonzalol_chinchilla.t_labores set grupo = #{grupo}, nombre = #{nombre}, fecha_comienzo = #{fecha_comienzo}, cantidad_dosis_por_ha =#{cantidad_dosis_por_ha}, duracion = #{duracion}, extension = #{extension} where id_labor = #{id_labor}
